--- select_tablesample_with_cross_join.sql
SELECT
  *
FROM
  Singers A
  CROSS JOIN
  Singers B
  TABLESAMPLE BERNOULLI (90 PERCENT)

--- AST
&parser.QueryStatement{
  Hint:  (*parser.Hint)(nil),
  Query: &parser.Select{
    pos:      0,
    Distinct: false,
    AsStruct: false,
    Results:  []parser.SelectItem{
      &parser.Star{
        pos: 9,
      },
    },
    From: &parser.From{
      pos:   11,
      Items: []*parser.FromItem{
        &parser.FromItem{
          Source: &parser.Join{
            Op:     "CROSS",
            Method: "",
            Hint:   (*parser.Hint)(nil),
            Left:   &parser.Unnest{
              pos:      18,
              end:      27,
              Implicit: true,
              Expr:     &parser.Ident{
                pos:  18,
                end:  25,
                Name: "Singers",
              },
              Hint: (*parser.Hint)(nil),
              As:   &parser.AsAlias{
                pos:   26,
                Alias: &parser.Ident{
                  pos:  26,
                  end:  27,
                  Name: "A",
                },
              },
              WithOffset: (*parser.WithOffset)(nil),
            },
            Right: &parser.Unnest{
              pos:      43,
              end:      52,
              Implicit: true,
              Expr:     &parser.Ident{
                pos:  43,
                end:  50,
                Name: "Singers",
              },
              Hint: (*parser.Hint)(nil),
              As:   &parser.AsAlias{
                pos:   51,
                Alias: &parser.Ident{
                  pos:  51,
                  end:  52,
                  Name: "B",
                },
              },
              WithOffset: (*parser.WithOffset)(nil),
            },
            Cond: nil,
          },
          TableSample: &parser.TableSample{
            pos:    55,
            Method: "BERNOULLI",
            Size:   &parser.TableSampleSize{
              pos:   77,
              end:   89,
              Value: &parser.IntLiteral{
                pos:   78,
                end:   80,
                Value: "90",
              },
              Unit: "PERCENT",
            },
          },
        },
      },
    },
    Where:   (*parser.Where)(nil),
    GroupBy: (*parser.GroupBy)(nil),
    Having:  (*parser.Having)(nil),
    OrderBy: (*parser.OrderBy)(nil),
    Limit:   (*parser.Limit)(nil),
  },
}

--- SQL
SELECT * FROM Singers AS A CROSS JOIN Singers AS B TABLESAMPLE BERNOULLI(90 PERCENT)
